title: If you want to keep a clean record.
body:
/mute all

After game, report everyone cause they are all toxic no matter the circumstance.

Classic League of Legends

replies.body: That's funny cause I've used chat quite frequently over the years and have never been warned or banned, nor have I ever had to use /,muteall either. Also, false reports are thrown out, so there's that. While I won't deny that some people just want to watch the world burn and be Vicky from FOP maybe instead of assuming everyone is always wrong you try looking at yourself instead and see what you're doing that may be causing this problem for you.
Bold of you to assume everyone is mature enough to actually perform self criticism and do something about it.

>If you want to keep a clean record.

Be a  positive  potato.{{sticker:katarina-love}}
Why? Cant handle chat? Mute all is for pussies. ;)
